title: A couple of T206 for sale or trade

posts.post_title: A couple of T206 for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
I have the following T206 for sale or trade. Looking for Johnny Evers cards I need or T213-2 HOFers will add cash if needed.
[url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url] with any questions. Click on the images for an enlarged viewing.

Thanks, Mike
